Job Title: Ionic Developer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Ionic Developer - Remote, USA
About Cross Platform Developer:Cross Platform Developer is a pioneering company specializing in innovative cross-platform digital solutions. With a commitment to excellence and innovation, we strive to create applications that offer seamless experiences across all devices. We're expanding our team and are on the lookout for a skilled Ionic Developer. This role is designed for individuals who wish to work remotely from anywhere in the United States, offering flexible working hours between 9-5pm or 10-6pm. We provide the opportunity for both contract and regular employment, focusing on finding the right fit for our team's needs and the candidate's career aspirations.
Your Role:As an Ionic Developer at Cross Platform Developer, you will be instrumental in building high-quality mobile and web applications using the Ionic framework. Your role will involve the entire application development process, from concept and design to development, testing, and deployment. Working closely with our team of developers, designers, and project managers, you will ensure our applications meet high standards of quality, performance, and user experience.
Key Responsibilities:Develop and maintain cross-platform applications using the Ionic framework.Work with the development team to define, design, and deploy new features and applications.Integrate front-end UI with the constructed APIs.Ensure application performance, quality, and responsiveness.Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks for performance optimization.Stay up-to-date with new technology trends, applications, and protocols in the mobile development field.
Technical Requirements:Strong proficiency in Ionic Framework, Cordova, and Capacitor.Solid understanding of Angular, TypeScript, HTML5, and CSS3.Experience with RESTful APIs to connect Ionic applications to back-end services.Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token.Familiarity with code versioning tools, such as Git.Understanding of front-end build pipelines and tools.Experience with continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) processes.Ability to write clean, readable, and maintainable code.Knowledge of additional cross-platform frameworks (e.g., React Native, Flutter) is a plus.
Experience:2+ years of experience in developing mobile applications using the Ionic framework.A portfolio showcasing successful cross-platform projects developed with Ionic, highlighting your contributions.
Who You Are:Passionate about building scalable, efficient, and high-quality software solutions.A proactive problem-solver who enjoys facing challenges and finding creative solutions.Able to work independently with minimal supervision in a fully remote environment.A strong communicator capable of working collaboratively with cross-functional teams.Eager to learn and adapt to new technologies and frameworks in the rapidly evolving landscape of mobile development.
Join Us:Cross Platform Developer offers a unique opportunity to contribute to diverse projects that make a real impact. Enjoy the flexibility of working remotely, with standard working hours that support a healthy work-life balance. Here, we value the skills and passion you bring to the table, not just formal qualifications.
Please note: This position does not require a university degree. We place significant value on practical experience, a robust portfolio, and a demonstrable passion for mobile application development, particularly with the Ionic framework.

Experience Level (if available): None
